wikipedia_page.main:
Sir John Bedford Burman (1867–1941) was Conservative MP for Birmingham Duddeston.
He was elected in 1923, re-elected in 1924, but lost the seat to Labour in 1929.
He was then Lord Mayor of Birmingham from 1931 to 1932.
He received a knighthood in the Birthday Honours for 1936.His son, John Charles Burman, was Lord Mayor of Birmingham from 1947 to 1949.
